title: string
summary: string (A 1-2 sentence public-facing summary, suitable for LinkedIn).
problem: string (A clear, concise statement of the problem or opportunity).
methodology: string (A bullet point describing a key action or method used).
outcome: string (A specific, quantifiable outcome or result of the project).
skills: string (A list of key skills or technologies used, e.g., 'Python', 'Stata', 'Cost-Benefit Analysis').
